summary: Necklace and ring retexture, engraved then enamelled
descriptionHtml:
Notice
======
I really like AEterna amulets and ring but I was looking for maybe more \"nordic\".
so I take the vanilla texture and I redo it :
- Engraved with knotworks
- Enamelled it with blue enamel

This is a replacer texture for all generic necklaces and rings.

The main file contain both necklace and ring texture,
optionnals necklace OR ring, no main file needed.

Installation
=========
Recommended with NMM
or extract to your skyrim folder

Uninstal
========
remove genericamulets, genericamulets_n, genericrings, genericrings_n
from Data/textures/Armor/amuletsandrings

Issue
====
none

thanks
======
Lydia who posed for the photo
To all the moddders for their efforts and works

About Celtic Interlacing
=====================
I use knotworks for my design
these are fairly common interlacing and I\'m quite sure that some of you have already seen them somewhere.
I don\'t remember where I have seen those one first...  perhaps in Bain\'s family books, or in manuscript... elsewhere ? I really don\'t know.
The only thing I know : although I have drawn on illustrator I\'m surely not the original designer

Credits
=======
Bethesda
me
Egon (The cat on my knees)

Permissions
===========
Just ask for ;)
author: Silmhiril
